messages.message:
Hey all,  just a reminder that @kunal and @Kai’s Tech Talk on “Control Plane and Deployments_”_ will be starting in about 5 minutes_._ They will be sharing a deep dive into how Instabase handles releases, uses docker and kubernetes, and the future of deployments and infrastructure management for Instabase.
*When*: Fri 8/12 8:30-9:15am PT
*Where*: Zoom Link (https://instabase.zoom.us/j/96016718024)
*More info and recordings*: Tech talk confluence page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/1263468737/IB+Tech+Talks)

Hi all, thanks for joining us to hear about the Instabase control plane today! If you have any thoughts/feedback/comments, we would love to hear them at <#C027EPGM2UQ|>! Here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/1263468737/IB+Tech+Talks) are the slides and recording from the talk.

Thank you everyone for joinin! Here is the Zoom link and passcode
Link: Zoom Link (https://instabase.zoom.us/rec/play/DuCY9msp1DDkAwY8MzhqMa818LttD5t3jWX8Scse5d7bE2NFWE7HluvU4851uWCAeRGHYjkuaS9LfIXm.tVUM_506w3_g8fIp?startTime=1628782292000&_x_zm_rtaid=y10GqpJBQE-k77NZzVBkbg.1628801865608.fc68b02341eac4a5416b8afc8c9fa208&_x_zm_rhtaid=714)
Passcode: PxNL3&mz
For future reference, these will also be available here Tech Talk Wiki Page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/1263468737/IB+Tech+Talks)
